# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mine at position (-21.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-21.0, -50.0)
- Transport belt going down from (-20.5, -49.5) to (-20.5, -47.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-19.5, -49.5)

### Iron smelting setup at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-17.5, -46.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### No coal in inventory to add to inserter/drill
- Ensure that there is coal in the inventory before attempting to add it to an inserter or drill.

### No iron plates in furnace to extract
- Ensure that the furnace has iron plates before attempting to extract them.

## NAMESPACE
